Text: hey all this is my first upload.  let me know of any problems.

You did a good job and a public service keeping alive the Gong Show dream. This is a rarity. It did a small VHS release then disappeared. I love when we can get hard-to-find stuff back in circulation.

thanks for the feedback.  i knew this was rare, at least in the torrent world because i've been looking for it for a long time too.   it's great to get this out in the world knowing that it's been an incomplete file for who knows how long.

thank you.  i love this.

but then i love sweaty gym socks!
